entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cranbrook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cranbrook Airport 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -11.2°C
Wind: SSE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
